author: Special Correspondent
text:
There will be power shutdown in the following areas between 9 a.m. and 2 p.m. on Monday due to maintenance work: Rajiv Nagar, Pagalavan Nagar, Tamizhan Street, Teachers’ Colony, Aravind Eye Hospital, Aavin Project, Viraganur, Iravadanallur, Babu Nagar, Ganesh Nagar, Kallambal, Silaiman, Puliyankulam, Keezhadi, Chinthamani, Ayyanarpuram, Panaiyur, Samanatham, Periyar Nagar, Thai Nagar, Ganga Nagar, TNHB Colony, Kannan Colony, Alagapuri and Rajaman Nagar.

Teppakulam, Adaikkalam Pillai Colony, New Ramanathapuram Road, Pankajam Colony, Anuppanadi-Teppakulam Road, Anuppanadi, Kamarajar Road, Thangam Nagar, Vadivel Nagar, Alagar Nagar, Kuruvikkaran Salai, ABT Lane, Meenakshi Nagar, New Meenakshi Nagar, CMR Road, Kondithozhu, Srinivasa Perumal Temple Street, Chinna Kanmai, Balarengapuram, Shanmuga Nagar, Navarathinapuram, Indira Nagar, Old Kuyavarpalayam Road, Lakshmipuram, Khanpalayam, Pachcharisikkara Street, Myna Teppam, Krishnapuram, Rajiv Gandhi Street, Mela Anuppanadi, NMR Puram, AA Road, BB Road, DD Road, Meenakshi Avenue and Tirumagal Nagar.
title: Power shutdown tomorrow
